page.elem: All of the aliens on this strange planet have been waiting for your ship to arrive.
Some of the aliens are very hungry and some of the aliens are very thirsty.
Good thing you have plenty of food and drinks on board your ship to give them.
Red Aliens are thirsty! Blue Aliens are hungry!
It is your job as a Space Ranger to take care of the aliens
and give them EXACTLY what they want...
Click on an alien to give it food or drink from your ship’s storage.
Discard the current food or drink by clicking anywhere in space.
This will automatically give you access to the next item.
BE CAREFUL! This is a strange planet and the rules are always changing!
As a Space Ranger, it is your job to give the aliens what they need, even when they change their minds.
Red Aliens are thirsty! Blue Aliens are hungry!
Red Aliens are hungry! Blue Aliens are thirsty!
But the aliens changed their minds again!
One-eyed Aliens are Two-eyed Aliens are
One-eyed Aliens are Two-eyed Aliens are

The aliens told all of their friends what an awesome Space Ranger you are and now MORE aliens are coming to get food and drinks! There will be a bunch of aliens and they move super quick, so think fast and remember:
Red Aliens are thirsty! Blue Aliens are hungry!
Red Aliens are hungry! Blue Aliens are thirsty!
The aliens changed their minds AGAIN!
One-eyed Aliens are Two-eyed Aliens are
One-eyed Aliens are Two-eyed Aliens are
Now, some of the aliens need food AND drinks
One-eyed Red Aliens are One-eyed Blue Aliens are
Two-eyed Aliens are hungry AND thirsty!
Two-eyed Red Aliens are Two-eyed Blue Aliens are
One-eyed Aliens are hungry AND thirsty!
Even MORE aliens are coming, and they are super FAST! Remember:
One-eyed Red Aliens are One-eyed Blue Aliens are
Two-eyed Aliens are hungry AND thirsty!
Two-eyed Red Aliens are Two-eyed Blue Aliens are
One-eyed Aliens are hungry AND thirsty!
When there is a radioactive blast, the aliens ALL change their minds at the same time!!
Red Aliens are thirsty! Blue Aliens are hungry!
Red Aliens are hungry! Blue Aliens are thirsty!
The aliens changed their minds again! Now...
One-eyed Aliens are Two-eyed Aliens are
Remember the radioactive blasts! The aliens ALL change their minds and need different things!!
Now you will have radioactive blasts and even FASTER aliens!
Red Aliens are thirsty! Blue Aliens are hungry!
Remember the radioactive blasts! The aliens ALL change their minds and need different things!!
One-eyed Aliens are Two-eyed Aliens are
Remember the radioactive blasts! The aliens ALL change their minds and need different things!!
When lightning hits only ONE alien, he instantly changes his mind and needs a DIFFERENT thing!
Red Aliens are thirsty! Blue Aliens are hungry!
When lightning hits an alien, he instantly changes his mind and needs a different thing!
The aliens changed their minds again! Now...
One-eyed Aliens are Two-eyed Aliens are
Watch out for LIGHTNING! When lightning hits an Alien, he instantly changes his mind and needs a different thing!
This is your final challenge, Space Ranger! Even MORE aliens are coming and they are super FAST! Right now:
Red Aliens are thirsty! Blue Aliens are hungry!
Remember the LIGHTNING! When lightning hits an alien, he instantly changes his mind and needs a different thing!
One-eyed Aliens are Two-eyed Aliens are

This is your final challenge, Space Ranger! Aliens now have to worry about LIGHTNING AND RADIATION! Right now:
Red Aliens are thirsty! Blue Aliens are hungry!
Remember the LIGHTNING AND RADIATION! When lightning hits an alien, he instantly changes his mind and needs a different thing! When there is a radiation blast, ALL the aliens change their mind!
The Aliens changed their minds and are coming even faster!
